TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INativeHandleContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

Docs.summary: Provides access to a window's handle (Hwnd) from native code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface enables adding user interface features to add-ins by obtaining handles to native Window resources and passing them between application domains.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance native int GetHandle() cil managed

Docs.returns: An <xref:System.IntPtr> object that represents a pointer to the window's handle.
